title: Arcane Lock
content:
Divination School (Wizard Subclass) Illusion School (Wizard Subclass) Transmutation School (Wizard Subclass)

Arcane Lock Tips & Notes

You can very well separate half of the enemies from a fight with this spell

Lvl 2 Spells Aid ♦ Barkskin ♦ Blindness ♦ Blur ♦ Branding Smite ♦ Calm Emotions ♦ Chromatic Orb: Acid (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Cold (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Fire (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Lightning (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Poison (Lvl 2) ♦ Chromatic Orb: Thunder (Lvl 2) ♦ Cloud of Dagger
